com.whirvis.jraknet.example.chat.server

Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.example.chat.server.ChatServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetServerListener

    public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RakNetServerListener
    A simple chat server built using JRakNet.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin
